name: Carry on (TalkerNeedsToType)
description:
There is no end to this game but try to survive by finding and consuming food and drinks and fight off the enemies of the land!

Carry On is a Medieval-like Survival Game. With systems like hunger and thirst, you must continually carry on and fight any enemies you come across in an act of survival. Following combat, you are able to acquire different resources such as food and drinks that will help you quench the need to eat or drink to survive a little longer.
